item.title: 阿达尼机场部门将投资 110 亿美元，寻求首次公开募股前的合作伙伴
item.description: 亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）集团的一位高层管理人员表示，该集团计划到 2030 年在机场业务上投资超过 110 亿美元，以竞标近十个新航站楼、升级基础设施并拓展飞机维修业务。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani’s group plans to invest more than $11 billion in its airports business by 2030, as it seeks to bid for nearly a dozen new terminals, upgrade infrastructure and expand into aircraft maintenance, a top executive said.】

item.title: 据说双威医疗将在 1 月份评估马来西亚首次公开募股的兴趣
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，马来西亚双威医疗控股有限公司（Sunway Healthcare Holdings Bhd）最快将于 1 月份开始评估投资者对首次公开募股的兴趣，此次募股可能会筹集约 7 亿美元资金。【原文：Malaysia’s Sunway Healthcare Holdings Bhd. will start gauging investor interest as soon as January for an initial public offering that may raise around $700 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 维斯塔斯 2025 年订单增长 74%，政策担忧缓解
item.description: 1 月份，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的回归和他的反可再生能源政策对维斯塔斯风能系统公司（Vestas Wind Systems A/S）来说并不乐观。【原文：Things weren’t looking good for Vestas Wind Systems A/S in January, with the return of Donald Trump and his anti-renewables policies after an already difficult stretch for the turbine maker.】

item.title: 印度大刀阔斧的金融改革瞄准外国资金浪潮
item.description: 印度期待已久的一揽子金融服务改革正在为外国资本涌入这个世界上增长最快的主要经济体创造条件。【原文：India’s long-awaited package of financial services reforms is setting the stage for a surge of foreign capital into the world’s fastest-growing major economy.】

item.title: 日本 10 年期债券收益率自 2006 年以来首次达到 2
item.description: 在日本央行将基准利率提高到 30 年来的最高点后，日本 10 年期国债收益率自 2006 年以来首次达到 2% 的里程碑。【原文：Japan’s 10-year government bond yield hit the 2% milestone for the first time since 2006 after the Bank of Japan raised its benchmark interest rate to the highest in 30 years.】

item.title: 分析师称日本央行未来加息前景不明日元走软
item.description: 分析师表示，在日本央行未就未来收紧货币政策的时机提供明确指导后，日元兑美元走软。虽然日本央行一如预期将基准利率上调至 1995 年以来的最高水平，但投资者现在将把目光转向日本央行行长上田一夫周五晚些时候的新闻发布会。【原文：The yen weakened against the dollar after the Bank of Japan offered no clear guidance on the timing of future monetary tightening, analysts said. While the central bank raised its benchmark interest rate to its highest level since 1995 as expected, investors will now turn to Governor Kazuo Ueda’s press conference later Friday.】

item.title: 中国 A500 ETF 资金流入量临近年底飙升至历史新高
item.description: 周四，一组追踪中证 A500 指数的交易所交易基金的资金流入量飙升至新纪录，强劲的资金活动令交易员们感到困惑。【原文：Inflows to a group of exchange-traded funds tracking the CSI A500 Index surged to a fresh record on Thursday, with the strong activity leaving traders perplexed.】

item.title: 日元跌势扩大，日本 10 年期国债收益率创 2006 年以来新高
item.description: 日本央行将基准利率上调 25 个基点后，日元兑美元的跌幅扩大。10 年期日本国债收益率升至 2.0%，为 2006 年以来最高。【原文：The yen extended losses against the dollar after the Bank of Japan raised its benchmark interest rate by 25 basis points. The 10-year Japanese government bond yield rose to 2.0%, the highest since 2006.】

item.title: 印尼发出削减矿山产量信号后，镍延续反弹势头
item.description: 镍连续第三天走高，延续了从八个月低点反弹的势头，原因是头号生产国印度尼西亚的供应有望减少。【原文：Nickel advanced for a third day, extending its rebound from an eight-month low on the prospect of reduced supply from top producer Indonesia.】

item.title: 日本央行将基准利率上调至 1995 年以来最高水平
item.description: 日本央行将基准利率上调至 30 年来的最高点，这表明日本央行对实现其十多年来一直追求的稳定通胀目标的信心与日俱增。【原文：The Bank of Japan raised its benchmark interest rate to the highest in 30 years, in a sign of growing conviction that it can attain the stable inflation target it has pursued for more than a decade.】

item.title: 中国焦煤将创八月以来最大单周涨幅
item.description: 中国焦煤期货创下自 8 月份以来的最大单周涨幅，受市场情绪推动，铁矿石和钢材价格也随之上涨。【原文：Chinese coking coal futures headed for their biggest weekly gain since August, in a sentiment-driven rally that also helped lift iron ore and steel prices.】

item.title: 俄罗斯准备在明年增税前适度降息
item.description: 俄罗斯央行将连续第二次将其关键利率下调半个百分点，在即将到来的增税是否会刺激通胀的不确定性下，这对放缓的经济只能提供有限的缓解。【原文：The Bank of Russia is set to make a second straight half percentage-point cut to its key interest rate, offering only limited relief to the slowing economy amid uncertainty over whether an upcoming tax hike could stoke inflation.】

item.title: ICICI Prudential AMC 交易首秀为其他准备 IPO 的基金公司奠定基调
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 丰田将在日本销售 "美国制造 "汽车以取悦特朗普
item.description: 丰田汽车公司将于明年把在美国生产的三款车型运往日本，这是这家日本汽车巨头为讨好美国总统唐纳德-特朗普而做出的最新姿态。【原文：Toyota Motor Corp. is going to ship three models produced in America to Japan next year, the Japanese auto giant’s latest gesture designed to indulge US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 据说马特-霍尔特将离开新山公司，寻求 300 亿美元的交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，新山资本（New Mountain Capital）的马特-霍尔特（Matt Holt）已离开该公司，并正在洽谈收购其投资的五家公司，交易价值超过 300 亿美元。【原文：New Mountain Capital’s Matt Holt has left the firm and is in talks to buy five of its portfolio companies in a deal valued at more than $30 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 高盛和摩根大通认为印度创纪录的首次公开募股热潮将持续到 2026 年
item.description: 据顶级投资银行家称，2026 年印度首次公开募股的收益可能会连续第三年创下纪录，强劲的募股渠道和投资者旺盛的需求支撑了这一势头。【原文：India’s proceeds from initial public offerings in 2026 may hit a record for a third year, with a strong pipeline and buoyant investor demand supporting momentum, according to top investment bankers.】

item.title: 普遍预期日本央行将加息至三十年来最高水平
item.description: 东京日本银行总部。摄影师：Kiyoshi Ota/BloombergKiyoshi Ota/Bloomberg【原文：The Bank of Japan headquarters in Tokyo. Photographer: Kiyoshi Ota/Bloomberg】

item.title: 参议院批准塞利格担任美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）主席，希尔负责美国联邦存款保险公司（FDIC
item.description: 美国参议院周四晚确认迈克尔-塞利格（Michael Selig）为商品期货交易委员会主席，特拉维斯-希尔（Travis Hill）为联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corp.【原文：The US Senate on Thursday night confirmed Michael Selig as chairman of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission and Travis Hill as chairman of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp., installing permanent chiefs of two agencies that play critical roles overseeing financial markets and banks.】

item.title: ICICI Prudential AMC 首次登陆印度，全球投资者纷纷涌入
item.description: ICICI Prudential 资产管理公司的股票将于周五在孟买开始交易，此前该公司首次公开募股共募集资金 1,060 亿卢比（12 亿美元），这可能是该公司今年最后一次大规模上市。【原文：ICICI Prudential Asset Management Co.’s shares are set to begin trading in Mumbai on Friday, following an initial public offering that raised 106 billion rupees ($1.2 billion), potentially marking the year’s final major listing.】

item.title: 日本执政联盟同意提高国防所得税
item.description: Japan’s Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi and her ruling coalition are poised to sign off on an income tax hike starting in 2027 to help finance a planned increase in defense spending, moving forward long-delayed plans as security concerns intensify.

item.title: 索尼扩大对 "花生 "品牌的控制，内容业务不断增长
item.description: 索尼集团公司的音乐和图片部门计划斥资约 4.6 亿美元，控制由查尔斯-M-舒尔茨（Charles M. Schulz）创建的经典品牌花生（Peanuts）所在的公司，从而扩大这家总部位于东京的集团在内容方面的影响力。【原文：Sony Group Corp.’s music and pictures units plan to spend around $460 million to take control of the company housing the classic Peanuts brand, created by Charles M. Schulz, expanding the Tokyo-based group’s reach in content.】

item.title: 澳新银行因不当行为被法院罚款 1.65 亿美元
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦法院将澳新银行集团控股有限公司的罚金提高到 2.5 亿澳元（1.65 亿美元），因为在此前的监管处罚基础上又追加了 1,000 万澳元。【原文：ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.’s fine was increased to A$250 million ($165 million) by the Federal Court of Australia after an additional A$10 million was added to earlier regulatory penalties.】

item.title: 选股者在澳大利亚养老金大会上因指数风险而重获青睐
item.description: 澳大利亚第二大养老基金澳大利亚退休信托基金（Australian Retirement Trust）正在将更多资金从被动型指数基金转向主动型股票经理。澳大利亚第二大养老基金澳大利亚退休信托基金（Australian Retirement Trust）正在将更多资金从被动型指数基金转向主动型股票经理，理由是大型科技公司在全球基准中的主导地位日益增强。【原文：Australian Retirement Trust, the nation’s no. 2 pension fund, is switching more money from passive index funds to active equity managers, citing the growing dominance of major technology companies in global benchmarks.】

item.title: 新西兰消费者和企业乐观情绪刺激经济增长
item.description: 12 月份，新西兰商业信心飙升至三十年来的最高点，消费者的情绪也大幅高涨，这为第四季度乃至 2026 年的经济进一步扩张增添了迹象。【原文：New Zealand business confidence soared to a three-decade high in December and the mood of consumers also surged, adding to signs of further economic expansion in the fourth quarter and into 2026.】

item.title: GfK 称，英国购物者信心回升，准备大举消费
item.description: 一项著名的调查显示，与蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）提出预算案之前相比，英国人更倾向于购买大件商品。【原文：Britons are more likely to buy big-ticket items than they were before Rachel Reeves’ budget, according to a prominent survey that suggests sentiment has improved in the run up to Christmas.】

item.title: 中央银行预测：外国投资将促进爱尔兰经济增长
item.description: 爱尔兰中央银行上调了国内经济增长预期，原因是跨国投资前景更加强劲。【原文：The Central Bank of Ireland revised up its domestic growth forecast due to a stronger outlook for multinational investment.】

item.title: eFishery 的倒闭困扰着印度尼西亚的初创企业界
item.description:
"独角兽 "的失败正在引起投资者的警惕，迫使创始人优先考虑纪律，而不是大而无当的承诺。【原文：

Failure of the one-time unicorn is turning investors wary, forcing founders to prioritize discipline over big promises.

】

item.title: 日本通胀率在日本央行预期加息前稳定在 3
item.description: 日本的关键通胀指标连续第二个月保持在 3%的水平，这表明在普遍预期日本央行将把借贷成本提高到三十年来最高水平之前的几个小时，物价压力仍在持续。【原文：Japan’s key inflation gauge stayed at 3% for a second month, signaling sustained price pressure hours before the Bank of Japan is widely expected to boost borrowing costs to the highest level in three decades.】

item.title: Oil Heads for Second Weekly Decline as Glut Concerns Dominate
item.description: 由于对供应过剩的担忧超过了对潜在供应中断的担忧，石油连续第二周下跌。【原文：Oil headed for a second weekly decline as concerns over a growing glut outweighed potential supply disruptions.】

item.title: 信用风险增加，澳大利亚富人涌入私人市场
item.description: 越来越多的澳大利亚富人将资金转向私人市场，这重塑了澳大利亚最富有的人积累财富的方式。但这种转变是在全球信贷风险激增的情况下发生的。【原文：Wealthy Australians are increasingly steering their money into private markets, reshaping the way the nation’s richest build their fortunes. But the shift is unfolding as global credit risks stir.】
